name: Domination Pulse
overview: Control objectives to charge them, creating shockwaves.
primary_objectives: 1 Victory Point for each controlled Primary Objective at the start of the round, with additional points for Charged and Unstable states.
secondary_objectives: 1 Victory Point per round for each controlled Secondary Objective.
special_rules: Primary Objectives have three states: Normal, Charged (after 1 round of control), and Unstable (after 2 rounds). Charged objectives score +1 VP, Unstable objectives score +2 VP but cause 1 Wound to all figures within 3" at the end of the round.
